channel.title: PI Curses headicons are not showing..?
channel.description: When i click on like soulsplit and all the other headicon prayers nothing pops up and the prayer doesn't drain. i added everything from a tutorial.. LOL?

item.title: PI Curses headicons are not showing..?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

We’re the icons added client sided?

Possibly post code pertaining to the “show head icon” and “drain prayer” areas. We aren’t all psychic you know?

Read full topic
item.source: PI Curses headicons are not showing..?

item.title: PI Curses headicons are not showing..?
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:527472”]Does your client actually have the head icons?
use this command to test your head icons:

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("head")) {
			String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
			c.sendMessage("new head = " + Integer.parseInt(args[1]));
			c.headIcon = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
			c.getPA().requestUpdates();
		}

just do ::head 0
and so on. see if your client has the right head icons added.[/quote]

ya it’s added i’m able to use smite. im using a clean pi lol.

Read full topic
item.source: PI Curses headicons are not showing..?

item.title: PI Curses headicons are not showing..?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Does your client actually have the head icons?
use this command to test your head icons:

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("head")) {
			String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
			c.sendMessage("new head = " + Integer.parseInt(args[1]));
			c.headIcon = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
			c.getPA().requestUpdates();
		}

just do ::head 0
and so on. see if your client has the right head icons added.

Read full topic
